sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.KBSearchDeduplication</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>If a search happened within 10 seconds of the previous search in that session and if either of the search term starts with other search term than the previous is marked "Not Final".

Sample usage:

To process all the search that happened yesterday,

new global.KnowledgeSearchDeduplication().process();

For specific day,

var gd = new GlideDate();
gd.setValue('2020-03-27');
var searchDedupe = new global.KBSearchDeduplication();
searchDedupe.process(gd);

Few sessions of a specific day.

var gd = new GlideDate();
gd.setValue('2020-03-27');
var searchDedupe = new global.KnowledgeSearchDeduplication();
searchDedupe.process(gd, 'session_id=123456ABCDE123456');</description>
        <name>KBSearchDeduplication</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var KBSearchDeduplication = Class.create();
KBSearchDeduplication.prototype = Object.extendsObject(KBSearchDeduplicationSNC, {
  
    type: 'KBSearchDeduplication'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-09-17 06:25:49</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>881677a5c79710108ad4010703c2605d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>KBSearchDeduplication</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Knowledge Management Core" source="com.glideapp.knowledge">e011410f6d2620100acb70b353433002</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_881677a5c79710108ad4010703c2605d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-09-17 09:05:18</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>167</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
